title: Microsoft Outlook Import/Export Preferences
description: Preferences for Microsoft Outlook Import/Export Functionality

DisableImport.title: Disable Import
DisableImport.description: (DisableImport)-Prevent users from being able to import archive files (.olm and .pst) and Outlook 2011 for Mac data

DisableExport.title: Disable Export
DisableExport.description: (DisableExport)-Prevent users from being able to export archive files (.olm)
